item.title: Palantir’s sharp stock drop just prompted one bear to abandon his stance
item.description: Palantir’s stock trades at a “frothy” multiple, but one former critic says his view on valuation has evolved somewhat.

item.title: I’m 69 and only have $121,000 in my 401(k). How can I repair the damage of the past?
item.description: “I plan to work and contribute to a 401(k) in addition to a stock-purchasing plan for a few more years.”

item.title: Let’s call tariffs what they are: A tax hike on Americans
item.description: Congress has effectively given the president the power to impose new taxes.

item.title: GOP tax leader promises Trump a bill with no tax on tips, overtime. Here’s his aggressive timeline.
item.description: A GOP package aims to extend the 2017 Trump tax cuts and include new breaks for seniors and Americans who rely on tips and overtime pay.

item.title: Trump’s trade war will hit hardest at home. This is the biggest casualty.
item.description: U.S. trading partners will find that American consumers can be replaced.
